Improve this question                    For this string, 16.82080560, 96.13055810 I want to get"String one = 16.82080560"and"String two = 96.13055810"in android.Admin that I suck in string manipulation and regex.Please let me know how can I get such two value from a string.
Please using this api: StringTokenizer.nextToken.
Answer:


*

*<<<api>>>: StringTokenizer.nextToken

*<<<code>>>: StringTokenizer st = new StringTokenizer(string, ",");
String one = st.nextToken();
String two = st.nextToken();

*<<<explanation>>>: This code will split the string into two parts using the comma as the delimiter. The first part will be stored in one and the second part will be stored in two.
